Name: Randa
description:
Randa, who appears in the photo, is a 39-year-old from Khan Younis, Gaza Strip. She is a widow woman raising five children, she tries so hard to cover all their needs. She works in the public sector where she earns a low income, this income is barely enough for the basic needs for her children.

She has an citrus land close to her house, she take care of it. She harvests it and sells the harvest in the market to earn more income and enhance her family living standards. She went to Palestine for Credit and Development FATEN to request a US Dollar loan to buy agricultural fertilizers, seeds and insecticides for her land.

She hopes you will help and fund her loan.
